name: Alpha Sniper Mission
description:
Go against enemy soldiers that have taken over the small working towns and dockyards to use for their military operations. It's up to you to help save the towns and bring the peace back to the people living there. Get straight into the action of this highly advance sniper shooting game.

Features:
First-person shooting game with precise controls
Sniper fighting game
Extreme shooting action with real effects
Challenging missions for modern furry assassin shooter
Breathtaking realistic visuals
Hard shooting missions in best sniper shooting game
Excellent artificial intelligence and real physics based game
Efficient weapon controls & movement
Stunning graphics and outstanding sound effects
